00026 #include "AO.hpp"
00027 
00028 namespace SilentMedia {
00029   namespace Audio {
00030     namespace SoundSystem {
00031       AO::AO() {
00032         device = NULL;
00033         default_driver = -1;
00034         ao_initialize();
00035       }
00036 
00037       AO::~AO() {
00038       }
00039 
00040       bool AO::init(string driver) {
00041         if (driver.empty()) {
00042           default_driver = ao_default_driver_id();
00043         } else {
00044           default_driver = ao_driver_id(driver.c_str());
00045         }
00046         return default_driver;
00047       }
00048 
00049       void AO::setParams(int channels, int sampleRate, int bits) {
00050         format.bits = bits;
00051         format.channels = channels;
00052         format.rate = sampleRate;
00053         format.byte_format = AO_FMT_LITTLE;
00054 
00055         device = ao_open_live(default_driver, &format, NULL);
00056       }
00057 
00058       int AO::play(char * buf, const int bufSize) {
00059         return (ao_play(device, buf, bufSize));
00060       }
00061     }
00062   }
00063 }
